executeSQLs: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS surveyors (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50), password_hash VARCHAR(255), name VARCHAR(100), phone VARCHAR(20), is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT 1, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS survey_records (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, item_id INTEGER, surveyor_id INTEGER, own_store_name VARCHAR(100), store_name VARCHAR(200), store_address VARCHAR(500), price FLOAT, promotion_info VARCHAR(500), photo_path VARCHAR(500), photos TEXT, remark TEXT, latitude FLOAT, longitude FLOAT, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
